name: Tales of Valoran
summary:
《瓦洛兰的故事》是一部关于《英雄联盟》的同人网络漫画，讲述作者喜欢的英雄在正义之地之外的故事。作者以前从没有画过网络漫画，但是他希望大家能够像喜欢LOL一样喜欢这部作品。更新时间暂定为一周一次，但并不是固定的。

Tales of Valoran is a fan webcomic about League of Legends. However, this is just an excuse to draw my favorite champions hanging around outside the Fields of Justice.

I had never done a webcomic before but I hope people could enjoy this one, as much as they enjoy the game is based on. I’m updating once a week but the dates aren’t fixed yet.
info:
• 中文名: 瓦洛兰的故事
  • 作者: lendokhar
  • 官方网站: www.talesofvaloran.com/
